changes.change: -Fixed globe key cycling through emoji keyboard when dedicated emoji key disabled for bilingual keyboard

-Fixed respring loop introduced in 1.4.8, thanks to u/stardatearmageddon's relentless testing
-Added option to disable long press activate dictation
-Added option to toggle Memoji when input is Emoji
Added option to toggle Memoji when input is Emoji
Added option to remove dedicated emoji key on keyboard
Added compatibility with iOS 13. The icon is now a thumbsup since Apple doesn't provide access to the original icon in iOS 13.
Added long press to activate dictation.
